summary: Building a website for R&R Pressure Washing & Landscaping based on a logo. The site will include sections for Pressure Washing, Gutter Cleaning, Lawn & Landscaping services, and a contact/quote section. Branding uses dark navy, blue, and green colors, located in Covington, Louisiana.
architectural_notes: Business: R&R Pressure Washing & Landscaping, located in Covington, Louisiana
Brand colors: dark navy, blue, and green
known_issues: Logo image was uploaded by user but build has not completed successfully yet

existing_features.title: Build a full single-page website for R&R Pressure Washing & Landscaping based in Covington, Louisiana. The visual theme must match the uploaded logo: dark navy background (#1a2332), bold blue (#1e6fd9) and vivid green (#2db833) accent colors, white text, and a rugged yet professional style with a fleur-de-lis motif. Use bold condensed typography for headings. Apply this theme consistently across all sections.

Create a hero section at the top of the page featuring the R&R logo, the business name 'R&R Pressure Washing & Landscaping', a tagline, location text 'Covington, Louisiana', and a prominent 'Get a Free Quote' call-to-action button. Use the hero background image (hero-bg.dim_1400x700.png) as the section background.

Create a Pressure Washing services section listing the following services with icons or visual cards: Driveways, Houses, Sidewalks, Patios, Fences. Each card should include the service name and a brief description.
Create a Gutter Cleaning services section listing the following services: Debris removal, Downspout flushing. Display with icons or cards consistent with the Pressure Washing section style.

Create a Lawn & Landscaping services section listing the following services: Grass cutting, Edging, Mulch installation, Shrub trimming, Property cleanups. Display with icons or cards consistent with the other service sections.

Create a contact and free quote request section at the bottom of the page. Include a simple form with fields for: Name, Phone Number, Email, Service Needed (dropdown with Pressure Washing, Gutter Cleaning, Lawn & Landscaping), and Message. Include a 'Request Free Quote' submit button. The form should submit to a backend endpoint that stores the quote request. Include 'Covington, Louisiana' branding in this section.

Add a sticky navigation bar at the top of the page with the R&R logo on the left and anchor links to each section: Services, Pressure Washing, Gutter Cleaning, Lawn & Landscaping, Contact. Style the navbar in dark navy with white text.
Add a footer section with the business name 'R&R Pressure Washing & Landscaping', location 'Covington, Louisiana', and the fleur-de-lis icon. Style in dark navy matching the overall theme.
Render all generated static images (logo, hero background, service section illustrations) from frontend/public/assets/generated as static assets throughout the site.

Display the business phone number (985) 415-7267 prominently in the ContactSection component â€” show it as a clickable tel: link alongside the quote form, within the 'Covington, Louisiana' branding area of that section.
Display the business phone number (985) 415-7267 as a clickable tel: link in the Footer component, near the business name and location text.
Display the business phone number (985) 415-7267 as a clickable tel: link in the Navbar component, visible on desktop alongside the existing 'Free Quote' button.

new_feature_requests.summary: Hero section with R&R branding (dark navy, blue, green color scheme)
Pressure Washing services section (Driveways, Houses, Sidewalks, Patios, Fences)
Gutter Cleaning section (debris removal, downspout flushing)
Lawn & Landscaping section (grass cutting, edging, mulch, shrub trimming, property cleanups)
Contact/quote request section with Covington, Louisiana branding

Create a Motoko backend actor that stores quote request submissions. Each submission should record: name, phone, email, service type, message, and timestamp. Expose a public function to submit a new quote request.
Add contact phone number 985-415-7267 to the site (footer, contact section, and/or header)
